title: Dakota Access Pipeline Still Faces Threats
itunes:title: Dakota Access Pipeline Still Faces Threats
description:
Brendan Barnes, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Analyst for Energy Litigation, discusses how the Dakota Access oil pipeline faces continued threats to its existence, even after surviving another shutdown battle in federal court.

Leon Fresco, a partner at Holland & Knight, discusses the Supreme Court siding with the government in a dispute centering on immigrants reentering the country after their deportations were based on rules that were later invalidated.

June Grasso hosts

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
